name: Lenovo Ideapad Slim 3i
disc: The Lenovo Ideapad Slim 3i laptop features a 15.6-inch Full HD display and is powered by a 10th Gen Intel Core i5 processor. It comes with 8GB DDR4 RAM and a  HDD, making it a great option for everyday use and light gaming.

name: Samsung Galaxy A52s 5G
disc: The Samsung Galaxy A52s 5G smartphone comes with a 6.5-inch Full HD+ Super AMOLED display and is powered by a Snapdragon 778G processor. It features a 64MP quad-camera setup and a 32MP front-facing camera for selfies. The phone also has a 4500mAh battery and supports 25W fast charging.

name: JBL T460BT Extra Bass Wireless Headphones
disc: The JBL T460BT Extra Bass Wireless Headphones come with powerful 32mm drivers that deliver deep and powerful bass. They are wireless and connect easily to your smartphone via Bluetooth. The headphones have a built-in microphone and offer up to 11 hours of battery life.

name: HP 14s-dq2535TU
disc: The HP 14s-dq2535TU laptop features a 14-inch Full HD display and is powered by a 11th Gen Intel Core i3 processor. It comes with 8GB DDR4 RAM and a 512GB SSD, making it a great option for everyday use and light gaming.

name: OnePlus Nord CE 5G
disc: The OnePlus Nord CE 5G smartphone features a 6.43-inch Full HD+ AMOLED display and is powered by a Snapdragon 750G processor. It features a triple-camera setup with a 64MP primary sensor and a 16MP front-facing camera for selfies. The phone also has a 4500mAh battery and supports Warp Charge 30T fast charging.

name: Sony WF-1000XM4 Noise Cancelling Truly Wireless Earbuds
disc: Experience the ultimate in sound quality with the Sony WF-1000XM4 noise-cancelling truly wireless earbuds. These earbuds offer industry-leading noise cancellation technology, so you can listen to your music, podcasts, or audiobooks without any distractions. They're also equipped with a powerful battery that provides up to 24 hours of listening time, and they're designed to be comfortable enough to wear all day long. With easy touch controls and a range of customizable features, these earbuds are the perfect choice for anyone who loves great sound on the go.

name: Women's Printed Shirt Dress
disc: This women's shirt dress from Zara features a vibrant print and is made from a lightweight and flowy fabric that makes it comfortable to wear all day long. It has a relaxed fit and comes with a matching belt to cinch in the waist. The dress is perfect for casual outings or can be dressed up for more formal occasions.

name: Dell Inspiron 3505
disc: The Dell Inspiron 3505 laptop features a 15.6-inch HD display and is powered by an AMD Ryzen 3 processor. It comes with 4GB DDR4 RAM and a 256GB SSD, making it a good option for basic tasks like browsing the web, checking email, or streaming videos.

name: Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Pro
disc: The Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Pro smartphone features a 6.67-inch Full HD+ AMOLED display and is powered by a Snapdragon 732G processor. It features a quad-camera setup with a 64MP primary sensor and a 16MP front-facing camera for selfies. The phone also has a 5020mAh battery and supports 33W fast charging.

name: SanDisk Extreme Pro 128GB SDXC UHS-I Card
disc: The SanDisk Extreme Pro 128GB SDXC UHS-I card is designed for professional photographers and videographers who need to store large amounts of high-quality data. It has read speeds of up to 170MB/s and write speeds of up to 90MB/s, making it ideal for shooting 4K videos or capturing burst-mode photos.

name: Men's Slim Fit Chinos
disc: These men's slim fit chinos from H&M are made from a cotton blend fabric that is soft and comfortable to wear. They have a mid-rise waist and a slim leg that tapers towards the ankle. The chinos come in a range of colors and are perfect for both casual and formal occasions.

name: ASUS VivoBook 14 X415JA
disc: The ASUS VivoBook 14 X415JA laptop features a 14-inch Full HD display and is powered by a 10th Gen Intel Core i3 processor. It comes with 4GB DDR4 RAM and a 256GB SSD, making it a good option for daily computing tasks. The laptop also has a fingerprint sensor for easy and secure login, and a backlit keyboard for comfortable typing in low-light conditions.

name: Samsung Galaxy A52s 5G
disc: The Samsung Galaxy A52s 5G smartphone features a 6.5-inch Full HD+ Super AMOLED display and is powered by a Snapdragon 778G processor. It features a quad-camera setup with a 64MP primary sensor and a 32MP front-facing camera for selfies. The phone also has a 4500mAh battery and supports 25W fast charging.

name: Apple AirPods Pro
disc: The Apple AirPods Pro are wireless earbuds that feature active noise cancellation and transparency mode, which lets you hear your surroundings. They are also sweat and water-resistant, making them perfect for workouts. The AirPods Pro come with a wireless charging case and offer up to 4.5 hours of listening time on a single charge.

name: Women's High Waisted Jeans
disc: These women's high waisted jeans from Levi's are made from a stretchy denim fabric that is both comfortable and flattering. They have a skinny fit and a high-rise waist that sits above the belly button. The jeans come in a range of colors and are perfect for both casual and dressy occasions.

name: HP Pavilion Gaming 15-ec1024AX
disc: The HP Pavilion Gaming 15-ec1024AX laptop features a 15.6-inch Full HD display and is powered by an AMD Ryzen 5 processor. It comes with 8GB DDR4 RAM and a 512GB SSD, making it a good option for gaming and other resource-intensive tasks. The laptop also has a backlit keyboard and dual speakers with B&O audio for immersive gaming experience.

name: Google Pixel 6
disc: The Google Pixel 6 smartphone features a 6.4-inch Full HD+ AMOLED display and is powered by a Google Tensor processor. It features a dual-camera setup with a 50MP primary sensor and a 8MP front-facing camera for selfies. The phone also has a 4614mAh battery and supports 30W fast charging.

name: Fitbit Versa 3
disc: The Fitbit Versa 3 is a smartwatch that tracks your activity, heart rate, and sleep. It also has built-in GPS and supports voice commands via Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant. The watch comes with a variety of watch faces and interchangeable bands to suit your style. It offers up to 6 days of battery life on a single charge.

name: Men's Slim Fit T-Shirt
disc: This men's slim fit t-shirt from H&M is made from soft, stretchy cotton fabric that is both comfortable and breathable. It has a classic crew neck and short sleeves, and comes in a range of colors to suit your style. The t-shirt is perfect for layering or wearing on its own.

name: Men's Denim Jacket
